metadata.subject: Drunk driving
Drinking and traffic accidents
metadata.title: Impaired driving : a survey of Alberta drivers
metadata.creator: Alberta. Alberta Solicitor General
metadata.description: Cover title: Impaired driving in Alberta
"In May 1989, the Department of the Solicitor General undertook a survey across the province in order to determine the driving public's knowledge and opinions about impaired driving."--leaf 1

Executive summary -- The survey -- Main findings -- Conclusion -- I. Introduction -- II. Research methodology -- Questionnaire design -- Study population -- Response rate -- Analysis -- Demographic characteristics of respondents -- III. Results -- Knowledge and opinions on impaired driving issues -- Penalities for impaired driving -- Community action and behavior towards impaired driving
